main.name: Bruno Rocha
main.description: I am a full stack developer focused on creating efficient and scalable web solutions. I have a solid foundation in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Java, Spring Boot, and MongoDB, as well as hands-on experience with full stack projects, both academic and professional. I study Software Engineering at 42 Rio and have participated in complementary training through TripleTen and Oracle Next Education (ONE), which has strengthened my front-end and back-end skills. I am driven by curiosity and a constant desire to learn. I enjoy solving problems, thinking about usability, and working as part of a team to build products that really work.
